short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play the current URL on a Lyrion Music Server device

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you use Lyrion Player (https://lyrion.org/) and you have Youtube/Bandcamp etc. plugins installed, this plugin lets you play the current page on one of your squeezeboxes
